## Description
These crimson lenses glint with a primal hunger that sends a chill down the spine. When worn by a creature with darkvision, *predatorâ€™s lenses* increase the range of their darkvision by 60 feet. A [[Kraidyl|kraidyl]] who wears these lenses gains one additional use per day of their hypnotic gaze ability before requiring a short or long rest to recharge.
